description: an adversary may tamper with the two-factor authentication (2FA) logic causing unauthorized access to the target

1: adversary registers and activates two-factor authentication on an application
adversary logs in to the application and requests a code to be sent
the application sends the code along with an origin contains the username
adversary changes the origin value to bob and enters the code
the application authenticates the adversary as bob
2: adversary has a stolen username and password pair for a vulnerable website
adversary logs in and prompted with a 4 digits activation code
adversary lunches brute-force against and triggers the right activation code
